DOC.detailed_description: The objective PregSource : Crowdsourcing Understand Pregnancy ( PregSource ) : well understand range physical emotional experience alteration behavior woman pregnancy give birth , impact experience woman 's life , perinatal challenge encounter special sub-populations woman . Participants enter information throughout gestation early infancy baby online survey tracker via website and/or mobile application ( `` app '' ) . In exchange , participant able track pregnancy data time , print report share healthcare team , view summary de-identified data see compare woman .
